comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A very similar photo (same occasion, slightly different poses) was published in December 1916 among others on page 1074 of Flight magazine www.flightglobal.com/pdfarchive/view/1916/1916%20-%201082... SOME MORE GERMAN PILOT RECIPIENTS OF THE 430,000 ODD IRON CROSSES.—Top photos.,left: Lieuts. Reinhardt and Zahn. Centre: Capt. von Jena, Capt. Scholi, Major von Loeben, Count Schall. Right: the well-known pilot Ingold. Bottom photos., left: (names not given by Flugspori). Right: Lieuts. Saenger, Baas, Hahn, Pilot Ingold, Lieuts. Hug and Bremer, Sergt. Reichert. It appears that the photos were copied from the German publication, Flugsport.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Typo in "Bremmer" -- should have only one "m"

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.worthpoint.com/worthopedia/german-wwi-jasta-warplane-... is a "photo postcard" of this picture.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In an index to Flugsport aviaebooks.de/attachments/File/IHV_FlSp_Gesamt_1908-1944.pdf Flugsport, 6. Jahrgang, 1914. p 794 Ritter des Eisernen Kreuzes: Obltns. Saenger, Hahn, Bremer, Ltns. Hug, Baas, Vizefeldw. Reichert und Flieger Ingold

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for finding corrected names for folks listed in this picture.  We'll fix these next time we update.
